advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Stream 300+ live, HD, and exclusive stations on the newly redesigned Radio.com app. Explore by location, genre, or category to find your favorite music, and get local news and sports from across the U.S. 

• 	View Complete Track and Artist Info with Hi-Res Art 
• 	Save Favorites and Listening History 
•	Rest Easy with the Sleep Timer and Alarm Clock 
• 	Browse Station Info, Show Schedules, and News Feeds 
•	Read the Latest Headlines while Listening 
•	Connect with Apple TV and Other Devices through Air Play

**Radio.com accounts are now CBS Local accounts. Users that already have an account  will simply need to log in again. Users that log in with Facebook will have to allow CBS Local access for Facebook. Once complete everyone can use their accounts to log in on any of the multitude of CBS Local and Radio.com websites

**NOTE** If you experience any problems please Contact Support from the menu in the app. We're more than happy to help you.
